problem_text_cn: 如图,在半径为2的⊙O中,C为直径AB延长线上一点,CD与圆相切于点D,连接AD,已知∠DAC=30°,则线段CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in the ⊙O with a radius of N_0, C is a point on the extended line of the diameter AB, CD is tangent to the circle at point D. Connect AD, given that ∠DAC = N_1, the length of the line segment CD is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了切线的性质:圆的切线垂直于经过切点的半径．也考查了圆周角定理．
